Name: ball heroes
About the game: --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Please note that: This version is mainly aimed at North America. At present, the server is deployed in Silicon Valley.It is not recommended that players from other countries and regions buy this product now. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is a multiplayer game that combines football and action games. The core of the game draws on the essence of football and action games, while also creating some very interesting rules. Let the player play more excitingly! The basic rule of the game is simple: to get the ball into the other side's goal, no matter how or how you use it or the strategy. The other side to grab the ball or you go to grab the ball, OK, you don't need to be polite, wave your fist or hand weapon, give the opponent a color look. However, you need to be extra careful with the powerful monsters on the pitch, as they can kill you at any time. You can be a master manipulator, a resourceful commander, or something else interesting. Roles can use task rewards to upgrade equipment and skills. There are single-player mode and multiplayer mode, multiplayer mode after completing the simple difficulty level 3. Multiplayer mode currently includes 1V1, 2V2, 3V3, 5V5, and The map of 10v10 has been added to the product. This version has 12 levels, many monsters, currently, only one character is available, followed by new levels, roles, and monsters.
